product_desc:
We are making the most comprehensive consumer based financial platform on the market. 
Our goal is to have all financial consumer products on one platform working in tandem to better the user's overall financial life. We are launching beta in mid December with account aggregation, a budgeting utility, and investing(robo-advisor). In the future we plan to add Mula bank accounts (credit/debit cards), P2P money transmission, bill payment, all under one brand, all on one platform designed with intuitive use in mind.
name: Mula
